properties.description: Open from 24/10/2022. Our focus is on providing a safe and warm space for people to spend time with others, for company and friendship. A variety of opportunities to come in and keep warm through the week. Tuesday is the Horsham Matters Connecting Cafe with subsidised/pay-it-forward meals. Tea/coffee and simple refreshments will be available on all other days.
